00103 #define FAN_CONTROL_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00104 { \
00105    .id = FAN_CONTROL_CLUSTER_ID, \
00106    .options = { \
00107                 .type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, \
00108                 .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY, \
00109               }, \
00110    .attributesAmount = ZCL_FAN_CONTROL_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBTUES_AMOUNT, \
00111    .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00112    .commandsAmount = ZCL_FAN_CONTROL_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00113    .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00114 }
00115

00200   } fanMode;
00201

00203   {
00204     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00205     uint8_t type;
00206     uint8_t properties;
00207     uint8_t value;
00208     uint8_t minVal;
00209     uint8_t maxVal;
00210   } fanModeSequence;
00211

00213   {
00214     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00215     uint8_t type;

00217     uint16_t value;
00218   } clusterVersion;
00219     
00220 } ZCL_FanControlClusterServerAttributes_t;
